creator: emmanuel.goudot@lemel.fr
text:
In web.xml, init parameter "xindice-configuration" is set to "/WEB-
INF/system.xml".
But in Xindice.java, PROP_XINDICE_CONFIGURATION = "xindice.configuration"
So configuration is never read form system.xml file !

creator: gianugo@apache.org
text:
Thanks for reporting this, but please assign bugs to the list and not to
individuals. ATM I have only a sluggish internet connection with no CVS access,
so I'm unable to fix it.

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
Marking as invalid, this bug was fixed before build-1_1_b2 and does not apply to
CVS HEAD
